segments.text: I would like to return this pair of shoes .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Do you have a sales slip ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Sorry , things on sale are not allowed to be refunded or exchanged .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , but this pair of shoes are a bit too tight . Could I change them for something bigger ?
segments.speaker: S1
